oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sow and piglet skin, claw and nipple lesions on two concrete flooring materials during lactation period
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Norring, Marianna
Valros, Anna
Munksgaard, Lene
Saloniemi, Hannu
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The aim of the study was to investigate the skin, claw and nipple lesions of sows and their piglets while they were kept on two different flooring materials: concrete cement and concrete covered with polyurethane and graveled with sand (particles 0.5-1.2 mm).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Norring, Marianna; Valros, Anna; Munksgaard, Lene and Saloniemi, Hannu (2006) Sow and piglet skin, claw and nipple lesions on two concrete flooring materials during lactation period. In: Proceedings of the 18th Nordic symposium of the International Society for Applied Ethology, Finnish Society for Applied Ethology, p. 20.
